text: Dang tamen wanchengle ziji de dai hunqixianshi, nimen dang haoyi wanliu tamen, huo haoyi yu tamen libie. Nimen dang qing nimen [musilin] zhong de liang ge gongzheng ren zuozheng, nimen ye ying wei an la zuozheng, zhe shi yong lai quangao xinyang an la he mori zhe de. Shei jingwei an la, ta [an la] bi gei shei yitiao [baituo kunjing de] chulu.
